fields.description:
As a cloud administrator I would like to be able to create accounts without specifying an alias so that I do not have to delete the alias after creating an account if an alias is not desired.

We should also ensure that an account number is accepted in place of an alias where necessary (such as the euare-* commands as-account option and the console login)
